website_summaries.verdict: The magnificent paintings of Thomas Kinkade are perfectly complemented by beloved Disney characters, and between its lovely guide images and quality coloring pages, this is a must-have book for art lovers.
pros: 63 absolutely stunning coloring pictures combining the best of Disney and Thomas Kinkade paintings
Includes a colored image to mirror each coloring page
cons: This coloring book’s pages are not perforated, and was clearly not designed to have its pages separated

customer_reviews.title: Love this book!
customer_reviews.text: I love Thomas Kinkade! I have his other coloring book that is much more difficult to color in. I love Disney characters and I love this coloring book so much. It is a tad more easier to color in than his others and the lines/sketch are more on point in this one. His books have def improved if you compare to his others, hopefully the artist continues creating similar sketches. I have included the first page I colored and even took several shots, one at an angle so you can see the glitter, gel pens, and Metallics that I've added to the mix. Will post more pics over time.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is going to have a lot of fun coloring everything in this book. It loses a star because each page is single sided, the other side is an image of the original artwork. While that's cool and all it sucks because if you wanted to tear out a page you're removing the original image for the next picture. I would have preferred that all the originals were stuck in the the back of the book.
customer_reviews.author: M. Axe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful book!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book!!! Just for those who read other reviews that alcohol markers do not bleed through they do I also have attached a photo of it. The pages are thick but can't handle chameleon markers. I love the page sizes and think they are just right especially for the amount of detail are on each page. They are matte and not glossy pages which is why markers bleed through markers also make a halo effect on the pages which I personally love since after all I'm coloring work from the painter of light. Great book for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: RushAboutBusyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love Live & Dream
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a quality book like this to be put out combining Thomas Kinkade & Disney! Absolutely love it & the pics are beautiful ! Love the original Examples as well for us wannabe artists. I didn't want to wreak the beautiful color pics so I copied my coloring page to keep my beautiful book pristine. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: If you're a Disney fan you will love!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful coloring book! I had forgotten that I pre-ordered this book months ago. What a great surprise. I love how the coloring page is next to a painting. Very inspiring!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute coloring book. I personally like to remove the page I’m coloring in order to avoid being crowded by the center binding. This does not have perforated pages and edges are ragged when I tear it. Also, after I’ve torn out a page, I have to save it because the picture for another coloring page is on the back. Other than those problems, I think the pictures are pretty and fun to color. I have to add that I’m left-handed and that presents the problem with the center binding.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: I love coloring books, and I love Disney. This book has pages in the spirit of Thomas Kincaid. The left side of the page has the color version of the color page on the right. It is a heavy book and I think will be fun to color. I'm not sure if I like the color pages though. They are pretty, but after I color a page, it will always be compared to the professionally colored page on the left.
customer_reviews.author: KyRagtop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this book since I had just recently got interested in adult coloring. Surprisingly, I learned to blend the colors with my gel pens to cover the black lines. I am currently on my second page, so it does take time to do the pages in this book if you're trying to be exact. A lot of the pictures would be great to put in frames as well. I love this book!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Goins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is absolutely stunning! A must have for all Disney and Thomas Kinkade fans alike! I live the colored paintings next to the line art. It gives inspiration if you're feeling a little overwhelmed with color choices. This is a really well put together coloring book!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Well made except for one glaring flaw
customer_reviews.text: The production quality is top-tier...with one glaring flaw. The artwork that you can color (on the right side every page turn), goes too far into the left, towards the spine of the book...making it impossible to color the inside portion of the artwork that carries on. They should have given the coloring portion a margin (without the line art to color) of blank space, and an ability to pull the sheets that you color out so that you can frame them. This coloring book could have been perfect if it weren't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dashing

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool present to any Disney fan that likes to color. My husband is what we like to call "obsessed," so I got this for him at one point when he seemed stressed out, along with his own set of colored pencils. He had never seen it before, and was very excited to dig in and start working on. The images are really nice, and actually, appear to be the exact same as what is in the calendar made the last several years as well. I think this is geared toward an older person, but honestly speaking, I think my eight year old could use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Coloring Book for Disney Princess lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coloring book for something to do during this quarantine. This coloring book is really good quality and the pages have a good thickness to them. I really love that it has the actual Kinkade painting on one side and the empty colorless on the other so that I can see how the picture is supposed to look like. I love Kinkade paintings and how calming they are to look at. I took off one star because I do think that some of the shapes are really hard to color since they're small on the page. However, I definitely recommend this adult coloring book for all Disney lovers! The price point was also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kwon

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is amazing. For each coloring page, you get a print version of it on the other side of the book that matches what your coloring page looks like in his style. Gorgeous pics, some I've framed and added to a room. I love Thomas Kincaid amd pre-order two of this coloring book so i could color in one and keep the other. I'm so glad I did. It's got so many beautiful pages and worth what it costs to buy this. I included a few random pages so you can see the wonderful detail that you get in this book
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Full color illustrations along with matching drawings to color.
customer_reviews.text: This book is the perfect size (8x10) with rounded corners. The pages show the full color illustration and the drawing side by side on a two page spread. Of course it is a guide to help with replicating the Kinkade art work, but I like the challenge it proposes to me when selecting my pencil colors throughout the coloring projects. I also like admiring the full color illustrations by T. Kinkade. I think Walt Disney would be very proud. I will buy this type again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality  and imaginative.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery quick and arrived in condition described. Paper quality is excellent. Each page has a completed, colored by T. K., picture opposite of it. Although you can use your own creativity & color, it's nice seeing it from a different perspective as well. It's interesting to not look at a completed one until you finish your own. Amazing how we each see things differently. Book is great quality, accepts all medium and I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a relaxing challenge. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & AbiGail B

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful coloring book
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter adores this book. She spends hours coloring in it. Each page has a Thomas Kinkade Disney picture on one page and the same picture for coloring on the facing page. This is such a nice arrangement; sometimes she likes to copy his color scheme, other times do it her own way. I have seen other books in this series that have all the Kinkade ones at the end instead of next to each coloring page. This one is definitely the better arrangement. It’s a coloring book with an almost magical quality because of the beautiful works in it.
customer_reviews.author: blackberry

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING!
customer_reviews.text: WOW what a fantastically, beautiful and intimidating coloring book! The pictures are so detailed and STUNNING that it instantly excites you and makes you quiver with fear and the same time! What fun! 🖍🖌🖊🖍
customer_reviews.author: Dione H.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Disney fans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my special needs daughter because she has a small collection of Disney Kincaid paintings, and enjoys coloring. She recently got into these adult coloring books and absolutely loves this one. It has the colored print of the painting next to the one for you to color, so you’re not guessing which color to use for the Mouse. °o° Definitely recommend for any age and any ability. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This book is beautiful and my wife loves it so much! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Poole

customer_reviews.title: beautiful book
customer_reviews.text: This book is better than photos show. The coloring scenes are lovely and every one of them includes the colored scene on the page next to the uncolored scene for ideas and comparisons to make yours look like the artists. And the scenes are beautiful. Well worth the 7 bucks and some change Prime ship. Mine arrived in 2 days. If you or someone you know is a Disney fan and loves to color as a hobby , it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: joyce oronzio

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY TINY
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures to color....BUT....so much of the detail is so tiny that it is impossible (seriously) to color. First, some objects are so small one is unsure of what the object actually IS, and second, even the sharpest color pencil is too large for how tiny the object is. I tried using a magnifying glass to see what the object was and while that was helpful, I was still unable to actually color the object. DON'T BUY IF YOU HAVE ANY VISION PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Hartvig-Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect with this book but I'm definitely glad I bought it because it's exactly what I was hoping it would be. I haven't colored in it yet but I can't wait to do so. There is one side of the page where you can color and the other side has the colored version of what the picture looks like. There are some really small areas so I don't think a marker would be good unless it had a small tip to it. I love the colored pictures since you can copy the way the picture could look like or you can add your special touch to it
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Colored illustrations included as a guide make this an exceptional book.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a Disney fan so I hadn't really looked at it. But it is beyond perfect because there is a fully colored illustration facing each line drawing, giving the would be artist an idea of shading, light, shadows, etc. For the color challenged, it provides the perfect guide to new techniques. The recipient was beyond thrilled. Have never seen similar and wish more books should include examples as a guide for us beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Mom was thrilled with her gift
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this book for my mom who is an artist as well as a big Thomas Kincaid fan. She was thrilled with her gift. It’s beautifully done and each page comes with a full color paint right next to it which is really nice. It’s printed on nice paper and we can leave the book flat on a copier and copy the coloring pages over and over again leaving the book perfect. I highly recommend this to any Thomas Kincaid lover.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Intricate drawings. Hard to replicate original pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The book is nice and the Kinkade paintings are attractive. The paintings are hard to replicate because the coloring pages are line drawings and paintings are not. The paintings provide very nice guides for colors you can use, but don’t expect your finished work to look like paintings. You will like this book if you like intricate drawings. Otherwise, you might want to consider a different kind of book.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful coloring book
customer_reviews.text: This book is just beautiful. While the lines on some parts aren't super well defined, that has in no way taken away from the enjoyment of coloring in this book. I bought this book primarily to learn how to use alcohol markers. You cannot use alcohol-based markers in the book without ruining the opposite side of the page, which is the colored version of the next illustration. However, I was able to adequately photocopy pages without taking apart the book. Colored pencils are probably best to use if you want to color inside the book.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful coloring book. The line drawings are lovely. Each coloring page has the full color painting opposite. However, the ink from those pages has such a strong odor that I can't stand to have it open. Another negative is the small size. Be advised that this is not as large as other adult coloring books. So the spaces you're working with are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Disney lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful book but the pages are thin for some mediums such as marker and watercolor. I also find th at the lines work îsa bit patchy leaving one too use their imagination to complete a picture. It would be good for Ann artist type person but harder for regular color book artist. I really like that the artist provide Ann example of each image t that you could use as a tool for inspiration or create thought own masterpieces. I gave 4 points for paper quality only because that is important aspect of colored books for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aeriolle Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I received this coloring book with another one that I bought on the same day. They were both in the same package and the packaging is perfectly fine on the outside. This book has damage everywhere all over the outside and along the spine. This was a gift for a good friend. Very much not impressed. The other coloring book was perfectly fine no damage whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarskoota

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Disney Scenes
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed, and my 11 year old granddaughter and I especially love that each page to color is opposite a picture colored as Thomas Kinkaide painted it. It shows the shading he used and allows the color-er to make the page they are coloring as simple or intricate as they like. Really impressive pictures of favorite Disney scenes.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO DIFFICULT
customer_reviews.text: The other thing I didn't care for was the lines were "boxy" - kind of hard to follow the lines.
customer_reviews.author: c-bert

customer_reviews.title: Yay for examples! Great coloring book
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I finally found a coloring book that includes example, pre colored versions of the pictures. My little brother loves to copy a pre colored page and then color at the same way himself. He doesn't like coloring unless he can do it that way, and most coloring books don't have that, so this was a really nice find.
customer_reviews.author: TrippNessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun to reimagine the colors of Thomas Kinkade!
customer_reviews.text: We are big Disney fans at our house and my wife is very into coloring as a stress relief. We both simply love this book as it allows you to either try to match the original painting, or you can re-imagine it with your own color choices! It shows you the original on one side while you color the other! I recommend this to Disney and Kinkade fans alike!
customer_reviews.author: Bill R Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: One of our more favorable purchases! I will be purchasing another one for a gift for someone else. Really fun to color and spot hidden Disney Easter eggs in basically each and every photo. I will be buying myself one as well. So it comes with what Thomas made and colored and comes with the same photo just uncolored. We cut out our favorite pictures and framed them. LOVE IT! 🥰 really great coloring book. Look in the details of the pictures to find hidden gems like characters from other movies.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunningly beautiful book. My only problem is that I can't decide which picture to color first. The two-sided pages aren't a problem for me because I use colored pencils to color. I love that Thomas Kinkade's art is next to the coloring pages for quick referral. One of the reviewers didn't like that the pages are only parts of his paintings, but his paintings are so detailed that this is better, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Poole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Disney Coloring book
customer_reviews.text: I had always loved Thomas Kinkade’s work. So when I found that there was a coloring book of the amazing Disney images he created I quickly purchased it. Now that I have it and had a chance to color in it, I have to say I’m impressed. The quality of the paper is good and can handle several different mediums. I only wish this book was printed on single pages so that I could use alcohol based markers without messing up Thomas Kinkade’s colored image. I have a longer review video and my colored image uploaded.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coloring book! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today and I am so excited to start coloring this book!!! It's awesome. The level of detail is impressive, the drawings are cute and I will definitely be entertained for a long while. Great illustrations, quality paper and you just can't beat the Disney & Kincade combo. Now I want the poster book too. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book seems nice however the lines don’t attach. It’s more like a water paint book rather than a coloring book. I purchased this book as well as a cheaper Disney coloring book. And I prefer the cheaper one with finished and attached lines.
customer_reviews.author: Ally H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & creative !
customer_reviews.text: The book is super cute but definitely on the more Artsy side. I was looking for pictures of the inside to see if it would be something I’d enjoy coloring but didn’t find any so I bought it anyways. If you are good at shading and using different colors for a bigger picture then this is for you! If you are looking for a “color within the lines” -straight to the point type of book this might not be your first choice. Definitely worth the price, since its Disney and a very dense book! Here are some pictures of the coloring options inside, enjoy your book if you decide to buy it! I sure did !!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mora

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth paper! Wonderful graphics! No wax based items for coloring.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it gives you the pictures to use as a suggestion for coloring, however the paper is so smooth it makes it difficult to color with wax based pencils. That's the only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars. Please keep in mind with this type of paper oil based pencils work the best.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: New favorite,,
customer_reviews.text: I am having a blast with this book!# ❤❤illustrations as expected, from Thomas Kincaid, are amazing! it is so nice to have a work of art next to you when you're trying to recreate the scene . all the original scenes are here. anything you could ask for and did i say I am so in love with this book
customer_reviews.author: robyn fair

customer_reviews.title: Intricate and beautiful artwork
customer_reviews.text: Thomas Kinkade’s Art is stunning, I love that the original artwork is on the opposite side to every colouring image. You get inspiration at the same time. His books are not for the beginner though as they are very intricate with a lot of details, but if it does intimidate you, it is great to keep just for the coloured images as they are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda RTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good coloring experience.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pictures tgey use as a guide for how to color the pictures. The only issue im having is that there are millions of tiny details. One picture took upwards of 3 hours to color. Also there is no way to rip tje pages out to cilor them and coloring them in the book is awkward because the binding makes it impossible for the pages to lie flat. But the pictures are truly beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the type of 'colors' that Kincaid uses.
customer_reviews.text: It's all right. But I'm tired of this "Cartoon" theme that coloring books are made up with. What I'm REALLY wanting to get into coloring now, are the "Real Life" type of coloring books. Such as, coloring what REAL "Marine Life" REALLY looks like in REAL life. And coloring what REAL "Human Beings" REALLY look like in REAL life. NO MORE "Cartoons" !
customer_reviews.author: David Stull

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This book has the page to color and on the opposite page has the finished version suitable for framing. I can't think of a show that isn't highlighted in this book. There are some really pretty images and it's awesome to see the real artwork, too! LOVE it! There is lots to fill in!
customer_reviews.author: H. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited for this color book because I normally search for the characters online to make sure I get the correct colors and shades, but this one has the colored pictures right next to it! & it’s a great quality book for only $8!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: A great deal of detail to color. I've always loved Thomas Kindcaids art. While I will not even come close to his artistry, it will provide a lot of enjoyable attempt.
customer_reviews.author: NisieJ07

customer_reviews.title: adult coloring book.
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my granddaughter. it's way above 6 years old ability. it's more of an adult coloring book. if you love walt disney and thomas kinkade ,and coloring, you got to heaven. amazing scenes, takes me back some years and leaves me with the enchanted figures and landscapes that only a mix of Disney and Kinkade can achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Chana.W

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: L.O.V.E. Have I only had this book for a day and I am hooked! I now realize that this is the book that has finally challenged me and that I was just going through the motions. I now take my time to concentrate and like my pages, not race through easy pictures to see how many I can actually do in a day. Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It's fair to ok
customer_reviews.text: Kincaid pics pretty dark. Not 8.5x11 but that is ok. Tightly bound.Takes watercolors if not too saturated. The majority of the pics are too dark to enjoy replicating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK to use with pencils
customer_reviews.text: OK if you use pencils. This picture was one of the first few in the book. So it tore out ok. Tried one in the back and it ripped. Not if you use sharpies like I do. Pages must be torn out. Which is jagged since there's no perforations. I did color one tho.
customer_reviews.author: Swarocks

customer_reviews.title: Hours of joy and peace per picture page
customer_reviews.text: So glad I discovered it. Went through a major life event and been feeling broken. Gave this a try. I have never colored in my adult life, don’t even sketch / draw. This is a fun challenge. Keeps me engaged, I feel excited to go to it everyday. I end up feeling like I created something. Great , well designed product. Just right!
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Could be designed better
customer_reviews.text: Not as much variation with Disney movies as I thought there would be (I thought there was going to be more main characters). You also can't take out and display previously colored pictures as you won't have the example for the next. But overall nice for Disney lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The joy of coloring
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this book. Because it had the actual painting on one side and the blank coloring page on the other for you to paint. If you look at my pictures you'll see what i mean. I wish the pages were perforated so that i could tear them out. Some of the scenes are hard to paint due to the grass and leaves not being well defined. As you can see in my last picture
customer_reviews.author: Beboop30

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible for coloring; the lines were so bad I cant eve begin to Express how horrible it was. Really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.author: Heather Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Disney Dreams Collection Thomas Kinkade Studios Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves to color in her spare time she loves this coloring book it was a great buy not cheap looking and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best coloring book ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most beautiful coloring book and pictures I have ever seen! The pages are nice and thick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color book
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me one of these color books. It's great stress relief. I am a huge fan and collector of the Disney Thomas Kinkade prints. My daughter saw this and wanted one as well. So, I have this one for her, I will gift it at Christmas. She will love it. The pages are just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Thrall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not for coloring
customer_reviews.text: We did not prefer this coloring book. The pictures are beautiful, but should remain just pictures. They are not well drawn for coloring. I also did not prefer that the coloring book appeared large but only half of the pages could be colored.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Corry

customer_reviews.title: It's a challenge
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the coloring page does not look like the picture with all the details. It is challenging to complete the coloring page for this reason. Don't expect your picture to look like the original unless your an artist . Still its fun to try.
customer_reviews.author: JazziTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coloring book
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this coloring book. It takes longer to color pictures because it's all so incredibly detailed and it takes a few coloring sessions (for me at least) to color a whole page. Each and every picture is stunning though. 5/5 definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Mcvey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: It has the pictures on the left side so you can use them as a template and they are in color...I'm not sure if I like that because it curbs your own creativity but the person I purchased the gift for LOOOOVES it so that's all that matters!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Pre colored sample  pages
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn’t read the description throughly but I was disappointed that one side of the page was printed in color showing how the creator thought it should be colored. I would have preferred blank pages to color using my imagination. The quality of the book is a nice as any soft sided coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coloring book. A good idea for folks who are not a natural color designer. The colored pictures helped me to relax even more because I did not have to worry about what color I would use. This is a really good idea, and I appreciate the customer service idea of enjoying the product as much as possible. A shout out to those Kinkade folks, he would be proud.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Thin paper ,use only colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: I was Disapointed, as for me I would have liked to have more of the Disney charactor and more important scans. And I do agree the paper is thin don't use any type of markers or pens, u will mess up your hard work and the pic guide.
customer_reviews.author: sweettumz

customer_reviews.title: It is outstanding this coloring book!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice coloring book, it has beautiful pictures on the inside fully colored and then a side where you can color the same picture the way the artist did it or in your own style, has a lot of different coloring pages from a lot of classic Disney movies. Good for advanced colorers and good for any Disney fan. I also ordered This book on a Wednesday night and it got here Friday afternoon so outstanding shipping and service. Nightly recommend 5/5! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Marano

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I love Thomas Kinkade and this was awesome. the only problem is that the pic to color is different than kinkades colored side. if you are one who has to have them details exact, don't get. atill, an awesome book n glas still I got it
customer_reviews.author: kimberly hoogewind

customer_reviews.title: So much lovable Disney scenes to color
customer_reviews.text: A lot of lovable Disney scenes to color. To the left you'll find de artist's version and to the right you'll find the page to color. I found it is perfect for hours of entertaining. I used castle art premium colored pencils.
customer_reviews.author: MCollazo

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is so beautiful! Not only is it great quality, the book also includes the original artwork by Kinkade so you can compare! It is also a decent size, a bit smaller than my other typical coloring book but not small. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Y

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book! Great pictures to color and I love the side by side with the actual Kinkade painting. Every page and every picture is just beautiful. I am very pleased to see so many of the Disney characters I grew up with. You just don't see the "good ol' Disney" anymore. I would not recommend using markers or any "wet" media, unless you don't care about the Kinkade picture on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: lovely art book
customer_reviews.text: these drawings are absolutely beautiful! The book, as a book, is loveky. As a coloring book? It's a tough call...you can't use markets of any kind because they bleed through and ruin the art. However, if you can copy off onto better paper, this is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: rockhound

customer_reviews.title: Cool but...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! But the pictures are split up... so the original Tomas pictures are basically split up into two pics... which is fine, but they are not back to back (to make one big picture) they are in different areas of the book.
customer_reviews.author: John Markwell II

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful way to relax.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife and she loves it,and it is just as described and pictured,and has a lot of pages to color and the pages that came colored in it are so beautiful that you could use them as pictures she posted the book on Facebook and now every woman on there is wanting one of the coloring books.
customer_reviews.author: Leon m

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together
customer_reviews.text: This book is extremely nice for a coloring book, and looks more like a collectible art book. The coloring pages are very detailed, but they provide a reference page for each, which also serves to prevent bleeding from the previous coloring page. This book is a great gift for any artistic Disney fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It is genuinely the most beautiful coloring book I've ever seen! I love this book so much! The pictures are so beautiful and the coloring pages are perfect for easy relaxing coloring or you can make it a beautiful art piece with lots of shading. I love everything about this and can't say anything negative at all!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Doolan

customer_reviews.title: Best Coloring Book Ever
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this adult coloring book for a friend who is stuck in her apartment because of the virus. It arrived on time, in perfect condition, as described, and is perfect. Each picture to be colored comes with an already illustrated picture for inspiration—a very helpful aspect of this book. We highly recommend this coloring book!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lutter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Disney adult coloring book
customer_reviews.text: I don't even like Thomas Kinkade, and I love this coloring book! I like how it gives you an example to work from. I love all the different beautiful Disney pictures! Brings out my inner child! Very fun and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: Love this... Brings me back to my childhood. Very relaxing to color. I love that there is the original illustration next to each coloring page, try to recreate or go your own route. Also, SO MANY PAGES! I don't know that I'll ever finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: I love this.... I love to color to prep myself for studying. It puts me in a more focused mood. This coloring book has so many pictures from all the Disney movies I love. Plus the added bonus of a reference page is awesome! Wonderful find.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Disney Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: Super nice coloring book. I wasn't expecting all the illustration. You get to color next to the page and it's beautiful. Gifting for my daughter as a Christmas gift (she's 13) and a huge Disney lover.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Even though it has beautiful pictures and is all Disney
customer_reviews.text: I got this coloring book to pass the time on a flight to Europe; however, the book is a lot more intricate than I anticipated. Even though it has beautiful pictures and is all Disney, it's more for a seasoned artist than one just starting out with the first time with an adult coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Erb

customer_reviews.title: Adult Disney Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed and has great Disney pictures to fill in.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The pages are quite beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coloring book. It has the pages for each drawing colored as a reference guide. It seems impossible to me to have your coloring match the reference page but it’s fun trying
customer_reviews.author: Susan I. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved this book
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a big fan of Thomas Kinkades work. He absolutely loved this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty, but a little much
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is really cool, in theory. It is so detailed, it’s a bit overboard for someone who just wants to simply color. If you want something really intense, this one is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!! I love the color reference photos!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started coloring yet, but I LOVE how they put a color photo right next to the blank one. So you have the choice to either follow their design, alter it, or go your own completely. With so many small, detailed, shaded areas I think the color photo references make it much more welcoming and less intimating.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures, definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Beautiful pictures. The lines aren't so small that it's impossible which is awesome and I love the variety of characters. The paper could be a bit thicker, but it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing artist
customer_reviews.text: Wow this book is stunning. I really enjoy this artist from the puzzles and I’m so glad to have his art in one book. The book is a little smaller than I expected but i got it for a deal at $7 so I think it’s worth it. I bought an extra to gift to my disney loving sister and she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful book! Each coloring page also has the full-color Thomas kincade painting on the opposing page, so it’s a visual treat and gives you some inspiration for your coloring
customer_reviews.author: Hope P.

customer_reviews.title: ... likes to color and is often joined by her great granddaughter. They both love this
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law likes to color and is often joined by her great granddaughter. They both love this. In her words, "It's beautiful!" A great find for any Disney lover who enjoys being creative.
customer_reviews.author: Lana LaCore

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love Thomas Kinkade, I love Disney. This is a beautiful collection of Kinkade Disney paintings! I absolutely love the fact that when you open to a page, on the page opposite is a print of what the original looks like! I honestly will probably use the prints to decorate!
customer_reviews.author: osubssw16

customer_reviews.title: Just as beautiful as you could hope for
customer_reviews.text: I had a little problem with the delivery BUT at no fault of the vendor. It was just delivered to the wrong address. The book is Vibrant and Colorful. Great for kids up to 80 yrs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Color me happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great adult coloring book. Be aware that each page has the full color Thomas Kinkade version of the picture on the left page side and then an outline version for you to color on the right page side. Use it as a guide or just see the difference. Pictures are beautiful! The full color versions on the left side are even suitable for framing if removed from the book!
customer_reviews.author: Your Fairy Godmother

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price and clear pictures to be able to color them.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coloring book. I'm a lover of all Disney and love drawing them...this book is Amazing. When I dont feel like drawing, I can color instead. Beautiful book.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful book. My daughter loved it. She has been coloring it for 9 months now and enjoys every minute of it. Paper quality is good. Does not bleed to next page. Well made. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this beautiful book!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful book! You do need a steady hand as the areas to color are small I would say 13 and up. I love that it allows you to have artistic control. You can use all types of tools to color with: watercolor, pencils, etc. however crayons would be too large. And th e best part is the prints are next to the pages to color to guide you. They are suitable for framing, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This book is absolutely beautiful. I like how the original image is right next to the one for you to color. Working on completing this as a gift for my 5 year old daughter who loves Disney and coloring. Something special mom made for her!
customer_reviews.author: MapelandMom

customer_reviews.title: Buy the puzzles instead
customer_reviews.text: Love the artist and the artwork, but these pictures split up parts of each drawing and it just doesn’t work that well. Huge fan of the Kinkade Disney puzzles (complete pictures!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Grandmother is bed bound but loves these books with some nice colored pencils. The Disney collection have some beautiful pictures of some of our favorite movies
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Disney scenes!
customer_reviews.text: If u like disney u will enjoy coloring these. It is very detailed. You get a sample of the picture colored also to use as a guide if u want, or get creative.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Warren

product_meta.title: Disney Dreams Collection Thomas Kinkade Studios Coloring Book

specifications.Publisher: Andrews McMeel Publishing; Clr Csm Edition (September 19, 2017)
